Благодаря станку процесс работы ускорится и он может привлечь клиентов своей скоростью работы и качеством. Поддержите этого молодого джентльмена.
texts.en: Saidgufron is a young man form the small town of Istaravshan. He is just 19 years old. He started working on graduating from secondary school. His family is in a difficult financial position, and so as a son and man he must provide for his parents and his brothers and sisters. Saidgufron has a place where he manufactures wooden windows and doors. Saidgufron has learned to do his work well, and wants to buy a good saw (for cutting wood). Thanks to the saw, his work will speed up and he will be able to attract clients with the speed of his work and its quality. Please support this young gentleman.

loans.use: to buy a wood cutting saw.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.ru:
Она Чамила. Ей 44 года. Чамила замужем. Она, как и многие жители занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Чамила дома выращивает скотов и занимается земледелием. Сейчас она посеяла дыню и арбуза, и ждет сбора урожая. 
   На данный момент у нее двое скотов. Чамила решила расширить животноводческую деятельность, путем увеличения поголовья скот. Она просит ей помочь купить пару телят. Чамила уверена, что ее поддержат и благодарит за помощь.
texts.en:
This is Jamila. She is 44 years old and married. Just like many residents, she works with agriculture. Jamila breeds cattle at home, and works with crop production. Now she has sown melons and watermelons and is waiting for the harvest.

Jamila currently has two heads of cattle. She decided to expand her livestock breeding business through increasing the number of livestock. She requests your help to purchase some calves. Jamila has faith that you will support her, and thanks you for the help.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Rohat

texts.ru: Рохат жительница одного из древнейшего и красивого города Истаравшан. Ей 37 лет и у нее двоя замечательных детей. Муж Рохат водитель, а сама она занимается предпринимательством. Так как у самой Рохат нет высшего образования, она хочет, чтобы ее дети получили его, и нашли свой путь в жизни. Но для этого нужны финансовые возможности, которых в семье не достаточно. Именно с этой целью Рохат обратилась за кредитом с надеждой на то, что вы поддержите ее в трудную минуту. Ведь от этого зависит будущее ее детей.
texts.en:
Rohat is a resident of one of the oldest and most beautiful cities: Istaravshan. She is 37 years old and has two wonderful children. Rohat's husband is a driver, while she is a business woman.

As Rohat does not have higher education herself, she would like her children to get it and find their way in life. This however requires financial capacity, which the family doesn't have. With this concrete goal, Rohat applied for a loan with the hope that you will support her in these difficult times. Her children's future depends on this.

loans.use: to pay her child's tuition

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She runs a fishing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Geraldine dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Fouzia

texts.en:
Fouzia is a 43-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is her husband, who is a van driver by profession. He drives in the main city and makes enough income to cover all the expenses of his family.

He wants to change the van's engine, as it is causing a lot of pollution and is consuming more engine oil than it should. Therefore, Fouzia has availed a loan of 60,000 PKR for her husband to buy a new engine for the van to provide better facilities to his customers.

Fouzia is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for their van to provide better service for her husband's customers.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба живет в городе Истаравшан. Ей 47 лет, она замужем и мать четверых детей. Насиба к сожалению не смогла получить высшее образование, однако она овладела искусством шитья и берет заказы на дом. Муж Насибы является преподавателем.  Как и все родители Насиба с мужем мечтают, чтобы их дети получили образование и работали по специальности. Однако трудное финансовое положение семьи не позволяет осуществить им намеченные планы.  Насиба по совету мужа обратилась за кредитом и с надеждой верит на положительный ответ с Вашей стороны.
texts.en: Nasiba lives in the town of Istaravshan. She is 47 years old, married and the mother of four children. Unfortunately, Nasiba was not able to receive a higher education, however she mastered the art of sewing and takes orders from home. Nasiba's husband is a teacher. Like all parents, Nasiba and her husband dream that their children will get an education and work in a profession. However, the family's difficult financial situation is not permitting them to carry out their intended plans. On the advice of her husband, Nasiba has applied for a loan and believes with hope for a positive response from your side.

loans.use: to pay for her child's tuition.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Молодую, жизнерадостную и веселую женщину зовут Дилафруз. Ей 32 года. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Дилафруз никогда не унывает и всегда ее можно встретить с хорошим настроением и доброжелательной улыбкой. Дилафруз занимается животноводством. Таким образом, она обеспечивает своих детей молоком и приносит в дом доход. Дилафруз покупает теленка, откармливает в течение 30-35 дней и после перепродает с наценкой. Дети растут, растут и их расходы. Дилафрузу нужно увеличить доход, чтобы суметь покрыть расходы на обеспечения и образования детей. Она планирует купить пару голов телят и бычков и увеличить поголовья скот. Поддержите Дилафруз.
texts.en:
This young, lively and fun woman is called Dilafruz. She is 32 years old. She is married and has three children. Dilafruz is never discouraged and she always meets people with a good mood and a friendly smile.

Dilafruz works with livestock breeding. She purchases calves, breeds them for a period of 30-35 days, and then sells them with a profit. But as children grow, so do the expenses.

Dilafruz needs to increase her income in order to be able to cover the expenses of raising and educating her children. She plans to purchase some calves and bull-calves and increase the number of livestock. Please support Dilafruz.

loans.use: to purchase livestock for expanding her business

loans.name: Ranohon

texts.en: Ranohon is a patience woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan into a family of workers. She is living in the district with her family. She is married and has three children. She is a well-known and trusted client at IMON. She started her business with IMON. She is an agrarian. She feeds, keeps and sells livestock. She likes animals and takes care of them very well. Her husband helps and supports her in business. She needs to treat her teeth and get a gynecological analysis at a hospital. She is asking for financial support to be treated at a dental clinic and a hospital. She hopes to be understood and supported.

loans.use: to treat her teeth and get a gynecological analysis at a hospital.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a 42-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband and only child who is still studying. Her husband is the main income provider in the family, and they cooperate together to provide the family with extra financial support. 

She works as a tailor. She is very talented at her job and has more than fifteen years of experience working in the same occupation. She’s well known in her area and works upon clients' requests. 

With her requested loan from Kiva Partner Vitas s.a.l, she will purchase a new tailoring machine. She is very optimistic and ambitious to open her own tailoring factory as soon as she can.

loans.use: to purchase a new tailoring machine

loans.name: Naziha

texts.en: Naziha is a 63-year-old widow who lives alone. After she lost her husband, she became the main income provider for the family. So she decided to start her own business in 2010, when she opened a small minimarket in her town, with the aim of covering her everyday expenses with the income she earns from her business. Today, she is applying to take out a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to buy a refrigerator, hoping to increase her sales and her income by a good percentage.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for her minimarket.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Cirila is 49 years old and has three children who are in school.

Cirila has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a 13,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing net and other equipment.

Cirila has been in this business for twenty years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other equipment.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is 46 years old and a married lady. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. Some years ago, she started her business of tailoring to run her household activities. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her family's everyday expenses. She has now requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase more spools of threads, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors for stitching up more dresses on time to get a boost in her earnings. She wishes to spend it on providing a quality life to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of threads, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors for stitching up more dresses on time.

loans.name: Kokab

texts.en:
Kokab is a 62-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband (also shown in the photo) at the corner of her house. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market and dealing with customers by sitting at the shop. Over time, they have become popular in their community for providing good quality products and make enough to meet the expenses of their four children. 

Currently, she requested a loan of 60,000 PKR  to purchase more grocery items including grains, peas, flour, sugar and tea to cater to maximum customers for generating a healthier source of income. She is positive about her future earnings and will spend part of her income on buying more items for her store.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items including grains, peas, flour, sugar and tea to cater to maximum customers for generating a healthier source of income

loans.name: Khursheed

texts.en: Khursheed is a happily married woman. Some years ago, she decided to support her family by starting a tailoring business at her home, as her husband's income was barely enough to meet their day-to-day expenses. Khursheed is popularly known in her area for her skill in stitching. However, due to a shortage of raw material, she is facing difficulty in meeting the daily expenses related to her business. Therefore, she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000. With the requested loan, she wants to purchase stitching materials such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth to stitch up more dresses on time. She hopes to get an increase in her income.

loans.use: to purchase stitching materials such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth to stitch up more dresses on time.

loans.name: Ricardo Abel

texts.es:
Ricardo es un joven estudiante de SENATI, escogió estudiar la carrera de Mantenimiento y Maquinaria Pesada para la Construcción, porque le gusta mucho esa área y desea tener mayores conocimientos al respecto.

Su mayor sueño es terminar exitosamente su carrera, convertirse en un gran profesional y convalidar sus cursos con una universidad de renombre, eso le ayudará a tener un nivel más alto de aprendizaje, por lo que lo beneficiará a él y a su familia, porque trabajará en lo que más le gusta, que es la construcción; ayudando a mejorarla. Cuando acabe de estudiar en SENATI, le gustaría especializarse en el área de Ingeniería Mecánica, para lo cual desde ahora se está esforzando mucho y está ubicado entre los primeros puestos de su clase.

Actualmente está cursando el II Semestre de la carrera, aún le faltan 2 años para que pueda terminar, pero debido a la difícil situación económica por la que está atravesando su familia, él corre el riesgo de truncar sus sueños de ser un excelente profesional. Él está estudiando entre 40 y 45 horas a la semana.

Él recurre a KIVA para poder costear sus estudios, cuando termine de estudiar, empezará a trabajar para poder pagarse sus especializaciones y le dará la alegría de haberse convertido en un excelente profesional y estar ubicado entre los mejores Ingenieros, para así ayudar y mejorar la sociedad.

El obstáculo principal que se le presenta es el económico, porque la carrera que está estudiando es una de las más costosas, por lo tanto es una de las demandadas en la sociedad.

Al recibir este apoyo de KIVA, él se siente bien al saber que personas como las que trabajan en KIVA ayudan a quienes más lo necesitan, por ello quiere expresarles unas palabras:"Gracias KIVA por el apoyo que me están brindando, verán como creceré profesionalmente y me convertiré en un gran Ingeniero, gracias a ustedes, que Dios los bendiga hoy y siempre."
texts.en:
Ricardo is a young student at SENATI. He chose Construction Maintenance and Heavy Machinery, because he is very interested in that field and wanted to learn more about it.

His greatest dream is to finish school successfully, put his degree to good use and validate his units through a renowned University. That would help him learn at a higher level, which would benefit him and his family. He wants to work doing what he likes, which is building, and helping to improve the profession. When he finishes his studies at SENATI, he would like to specialize in the field of Mechanical Engineering. He is already working hard towards this, and is one of the top students in his class. He studies between 40 and 45 hours per week.

He is currently only in his second semester of school, so he still has two years left before he can finish. But because of the difficult financial situation his family is going through, he is worried that he won't be able to achieve his goals, so he has come to Kiva in order to pay for school. When he finishes, he will start working in order to pay his way through the next phase of his education. He wants to become a successful professional, and counting himself among the best engineers in order to help improve society would make him very happy.

The only problems he faces are financial, because his chosen path is one of the most expensive, but it is also one of the professions for which demand is highest.

Receiving support from Kiva makes him feel good knowing that there are people who want to help those in need. That is why he would like to say a few words to the people at Kiva: "Thank you for your support. You will see me grow professionally and become a great engineer thanks to all of you. God bless you today and always."

loans.use: to cover the expenses of earning his degree in Construction Maintenance and Heavy Machinery.

loans.name: Behruz

texts.ru: Бехруз молодой житель района Бохтар. Он единственный сын в семье. Бехрузу 23 года. Он живет вместе мамой. Бехруз занимается мастером по ремонту домов. У него не получилось получить высшую образованию. По причине, что у него бело денег для учебы. Потом он начал зарабатывать на жизнь. Сейчас в семье работает только Бехруз, и он обеспечить семью один. Бехруз очень любить свою маму, и кроме мамы у него никого нет. Он просит денег, чтобы помочь маме купить лекарство для лечения. Его мама заболела, ей нужно лекарство. Сейчас Бехрузу очень нужно деньги, и он обратился к Вам за кредитом. Он надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Behruz is a young resident of the Bohtar region. He is the only son in the family. Behruz is 23 years old. He lives with his mother. Behruz works in home renovation. He was not able to get a higher education because he did not have money for tuition, and then started earning a living. Now only Behruz works in his family, and he provides for his family alone. Behruz really loves his mother, and apart from her he has nobody else. He is asking for money to help his mother to buy medicine for treatment. His mother has fallen ill and she needs medicine. Now Behruz really needs money, and he has turned to you for a loan. He hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy medicine to treat his mother.

loans.name: Brenda

texts.en:
Brenda is 63 years old and married with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Brenda has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Brenda requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell to customers.

Brenda has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Brenda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell to customers.

loans.name: Orlando De Jesus

texts.es:
Luego de quedarse sin empleo durante 3 meses, y pasar por una situación económica bastante dura, el señor Orlando decidió montar su propio negocio, una sala de billares. De allí ha logrado salir adelante y generar los ingresos mínimos para cubrir sus necesidades.
Trabaja todos los días durante 7 horas diarias.

Orlando cuenta con mucha clientela, pero actualmente su negocio no está funcionando muy bien por falta de capital y la competencia en el sector donde este está ubicado.
Es por esto que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de mesas de billar, un congelar, vitrinas y surtido de bebidas y snack.

Quiere seguir trabajando hasta cumplir el sueño de comprar una vivienda propia.
Ayuda a este empresaria a cumplir sus sueños, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
After being unemployed for 3 months and going through a very difficult economic situation, Orlando decided to start his own business, a pool hall. Since then he has been able to move forward and generate enough income to cover his needs.

He works every day for seven hours each day. Orlando has many clients, but currently his business is struggling due to a lack of capital and to competition in the area in which he is located. For that reason he seeks a loan to invest in the purchase of pool tables, a freezer, display cases and an assortment of drinks and snacks.

He wants to continue working until he achieves his dream of owning his own home. Support his entrepreneur in achieving his dreams. Make a loan.

loans.use: to buy a pool table, a freezer, display cases and an assortment of drinks and snacks.

loans.name: Lutfiya

texts.ru: 37 летняя мать героиня, Лутфия. Она замужем и живет в городе Куляб. Сыновьям  9 и 4 лет, а дочкам 15, 12 и 2. Мужу 40 лет. Дети еще маленькие, трое детей ходят в школу,  остальные в садик. Лутфия работает учительницей в школе. 5 лет она занимается учительницей. Лутфия добрая и шустрая женщина. Она решила начать новый бизнес, заниматься торговлей деятельностью. У нее план открыть продуктовый магазин. Для перевоза продуктов питания ей нужно деньги. Лутфия просит  кредит для старта нового бизнеса. Ей нужна Ваша поддержка. Вы можете поддержать ее сейчас!
texts.en: This is 37-year-old heroine-mother Lutfiya. She is married and lives in the town of Kulov. Her sons are 9 and 4 years old, and her daughters are 15, 12 and 2. Her husband is 40 years old. Her children are still small. Three of them attend school, and the others go to kindergarten. Lutfiya works as a school teacher. She has been a teacher for five years. Lutfiya is a kind and active woman. She has decided to start a new trading business. She has a plan to open a grocery store. She needs money to buy in produce. Lutfiya is asking for a loan to start the new business. She needs your support. You can support her now!

loans.use: to start a new grocery store business.

loans.name: Intizor

texts.ru: Интизор из города Вахдат. Она замужем и мать троих детей. 2 сыновей и 1 дочка. Детям 18, 20 и 28 лет. Тарший сын женат. Младшие еще не семейные. Старший сын занимается животноводством. Младшие помогает маме в работе. Невестка ведет домашнее хозяйство. Интизору 57 лет. Она на земле занимается растениеводством. Растениеводство ее любимое дело. Интизор обожает растение. Она сейчас собирается, посадит новый урожай. Интизор решила взять кредит и приобрести семян  урожай и минеральные удобрения. По этой причине она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en: Intizor is from the town of Vahdat. She is married and the mother of three children: two sons and a daughter. Her children are 18, 20 and 28 years old. Her eldest son is married. The younger children are not yet married. Her eldest son rears animals. The younger children help their mother at work. Her daughter-in-law looks after the house. Intizor is 57 years old. She grows crops. Growing crops is her favorite activity. Intizor loves plants. Now she is going to plant a new crop. Intizor has decided to take a loan and to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer. This is why she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Fe Y Esperanza De La Zona Q Group

texts.es: PILAR de 38 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos. Ella Pertenece a la Alcancía Comunal “FE Y ESPERANZA DE LA ZONA Q” la cual lo conforman 5 socios que trabajan honradamente y con ganas de progresar. Ella hace más de 8 AÑOS que se dedica al servicio de confección de prendas de vestir el cual le va muy bien. Gracias a su constante dedicación logro sacar adelante a  su familia. Su mayor deseo es ampliar su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida Solicitó el crédito para la compra de una maquina remalladora. La Alcancía “FE Y ESPERANZA DE LA ZONA Q” agradece a los Inversionistas de Kiva por el apoyo brindado. PILAR es la primera del lado derecho ella se encuentra sentada al costado  de su hijo.
texts.en:
Pilar is 38 years old. She has a partner and five children. She is a member of the "Fe y Esperanza de la Zona Q" communal bank, which has five members who work honestly and with a desire to progress.

For more than eight years, Pilar has made a living producing clothing items; the work has gone very well. Thanks to her constant dedication, Pilar has been able to help her family to move forward.

Pilar's biggest wish is to expand her business and improve her quality of life. She is applying for a loan in order to buy an overlock sewing machine..

The "Fe y Esperanza de la Zona Q" communal bank is grateful to Kiva investors for their support.

In the photo, Pilar is first on the right; she is sitting with her son.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Musallamakhon

texts.ru: Мусалламахон из города Канибадам. Ей 62 года. Она замужем и мать пятерых детей. Её муж пенсионер. Мусалламахон трудолюбивая и заботливая женщина. Она уже много лет занимается шитьем национальной одежды. Она покупает ткани и шьет платья, затем продает их  на местном рынке. Мусалламахон получает хороший доход. Скоро 1 сентября, начало учебного года. Каждый год бабушка сама покупает школьные принадлежности и одежду для своих внуков, но, к сожалению, в этом году у неё не хватило достаточных средств для покупки всего этого и поэтому она обратилась за кредитом. Мусалламахон не хочет расстраивать своего любимого внука и очень надеется на этот кредит.
texts.en: Musallamakhon is from the town of Konibodom. She is 62 years old. She is married and the mother of five children. Her husband is retired. Musallamakhon is a hard-working and caring woman. She has been sewing women's national clothing for many years. She buys fabrics and sews dresses, then sells them at the local market. Musallamakhon gets a good income. Soon it will be September 1st, the start of the academic year. Each year grandmother herself buys school accessories and clothing for her grandchildren but unfortunately this year she did not have enough funds to buy everything and so she has applied for a loan. Musallamakhon does not want to upset her beloved grandson and really hopes for this loan.

loans.use: to buy school accessories and clothing for her grandson.

loans.name: Mehri

texts.ru: Мехри 56 лет. Она живет со своей семьей в городе Исфаре. Мехри шустрая и общительная женщина. Она зарабатывает на жизнь честным трудом. Мехри продает женские национальные платья на рынке. Она всегда привозит ткани самого высокого качества. Мехри такая женщина, которая всегда радуется за других. Она понимает своих клиенток и делает им большие скидки. У неё много покупателей. Скоро осенний сезон и Мехри нужно купить новые сезонные ткани. Однако у неё не хватает средств. Мехри очень нуждается в данном кредите и обещает погасить займа во время.
texts.en: Mehri is 56 years old. She and her family live in the town of Isfara. Mahri is an active and sociable woman. She makes a living through honest work. Mehri sells women's national dresses at the market. She always buys in the highest quality fabrics. Mehri is the sort of woman who is always happy for others. She understands her clients and gives them big discounts. She has many buyers. Soon it will be the autumn season and Mehri needs to buy new seasonal fabrics, however she does not have enough funds. Mehri really needs this loan and promises to repay it on time.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics to sell.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
Maria tiene 67 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieta en una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

María se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado caprino, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 8 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cabritos, chivos y ovejas, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Maria espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María is 67 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her daughter and granddaughter. The house is in a rural area of Cayaltí district, in the Chiclayo province of Lambayeque region on Peru's northern coast. The locals here mainly work in farming, cattle-raising and trade.

María herself makes a living raising and selling caprine and other cattle. Her business is located in her home. María has eight years' experience with the business, and receives good personal and professional references locally.

This loan will be used to buy more billy goats, kids, sheep, and more, and to buy animal feed. María hopes to offer better products to her customers with this loan, allowing her to earn a higher income and thus improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more billy goats, kids, and sheep, and more, and to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is now borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

She supplements this income with earnings from her general store and rice retailing businesses.

Delia dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en:
Naheed is a 41-year-old lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Naheed  makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR which she will use to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. 

Naheed wishes to utilize part of her revenue on providing a good quality of life to her family members.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty used the previous loan to pay school fees for her children. She deals in motorcycle transport and has two timber-cutting machines that add to her  income. 

She is faced with the challenges of poor roads and the theft of motorcycles. This hinders the growth of her profit margin.

In spite of that, she is working very hard to expand her business to new areas. Betty needs a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Phalla's Group

texts.en:
Phalla, 35, lives with family members in a rural area of the Kratie province. She is a mother of two children, one of whom is in school and one who is too young to attend school.

Her main sources of income are from growing soybeans and working as a laborer for others. She has been involved in her business for 17 years, and she can save from her daily income about 26,700 KHR per day. Because of drought, her soybeans did not grow well, which is currently the main challenge for her in earning enough income to support her family.

This is the first loan for Phalla from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of two, she is the group leader. She will use her loan portion to buy seed and fertilizer, and to pay plowing fees to increase her crop yield. She hopes that she can generate more income to upgrade her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer and to pay plowing fees to increase her crop yield.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Irshad is a 50-year-old married woman and a mother of 5 children. In order to assist her husband in taking care of the family, she began the business of milk selling. She is known in her town for providing good quality milk. 

She owns buffaloes for milking. She is happily supporting her family with the income generated. She has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to inflate her sales, thus generating more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to inflate her sales, thus generating more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en:
Sughran is a 36-year-old married woman. She is involved in the business of cloth trade. She purchases a variety of cloth at low prices from the city market and sells it in her own town. She has a strong customer base. 

Sughran has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She wants to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors in order to boost her earnings.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business in order to boost her earnings.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra tiene 42 años, está a cargo de 2 hijos, Sandra se dedica a la producción de café bajo distintos sellos de certificación como ser: comercio justo y orgánico, Sandra comercializa su café por medio de COCAFCAL de la cual es socia, los mayores sueños de Sandra es poder sacar adelante a sus hijos y darles una vida digna y que puedan tener una buena educación para que aprovechen las oportunidad que tengan en el futuro.
La producción de café bajo sellos de certificación es una novedad en la región ya que permite tener mejores precios por el café además que se contribuye con el bienestar de la rica biodiversidad de la región, Sandra quiere certificar su cafetal bajo certificación orgánica y aprovechando que sus cafetales están en muy mal estado quiere replantar para iniciar la certificación con las plantaciones nuevas.
Sandra solicita un crédito para certificar sus cafetales bajo el sello de certificación orgánica lo que le permitirá obtener mejores ganancias por su café, con las ganancias Sandra podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y darles una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sandra is 42 years old and has two children. She is a coffee grower and works under different seals, such as "Certified Organic" and "Free Trade." Sandra sells her coffee beans through COCAFCAL as one of its members. Her main goal is being able to provide for her children so they can lead a decent life and get a good education in order to make the most of future opportunities.

Certified coffee production is a novelty in this region. It allows farmers to charge a better price for their coffee, and it helps maintain the rich local biodiversity. Sandra wants to get her coffee crops certified as organic, and since her coffee plants are in pretty bad condition anyway, she wants to replace them and start getting the new plants certified.

Sandra is requesting this loan to certify her new crops under the "Certified Organic" seal. This will allow her to make a better profit from her coffee beans. She will be able to have a better quality of life and give her children a better education.

loans.use: to buy the supplies she needs in order to transition to organic coffee production, such as organic fertilizer and  organic pesticides.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha  Província de Maputo tem 52 anos de idade, solteira,  mãe de 6 filhos maiores de idade, dos quais 3 frequentam a escola. Não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Começou a trabalhar com Hluvuku em 2010. Este é o seu 7º empréstimo na Hluvuku com o qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento e chapas de zinco para dar continuidade a sua obra.
Futuramente pretende é erguer capoeiras para a criação de frangos para venda e adquirir uma viatura.
texts.en:
She was born in Namaacha, Maputo province. She is 52 years old, single, and the mother of six adult children; three of them in school. She is not responsible for anyone else.

She started to work with Hluvuku since 2010. This is her seventh loan from Hluvuku, and she is planning to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement and zinc sheets, in order to continue with the construction works.

In the future, she is planning to build pens to raise chickens and sell them, and buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and zinc sheets to continue with the construction works.

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.ru:
Женщину на фотографии зовут Зухро. Ей 47 лет. Она проживает на районе Бохтар вместе с семьей. Ее муж с сыном работают грузчиком на рынке. Младший сын уехал на заработки заграницу. Сама Зухро с невестками работает в колхозе. 
  Зухро обратилась за финансовой поддержкой, чтобы купить одну корову. Она хочет обеспечить семью и внуков свежим молоком. Корова стоит дорого и ее собственных средств не хватает для совершения покупки, и она надеется на получения кредита.
texts.en:
The woman in the photograph is called Zuhro. She is 47 years old. She and her family live in the Bohtar region. Her husband and son work as loaders at the market. Her youngest son has gone to earn money abroad. Zuhro herself and her daughters-in-law work on a collective farm.

Zuhro has applied for financial support in buying a cow. She wants to provide her family and grandchildren with fresh milk. A cow is expensive and her own funds are insufficient to carry out the purchase, and she hopes to receive a loan.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 43 years old. She is married and has two children. She sells tomatoes and has been in this business for 20 years. This is her first loan from VisionFund Kenya. She will use the loan to buy more stock of tomatoes to sell, and she hopes this will enable her to make more income to support her family.

She will use the generated profits from the business to pay school fees for her children. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to expand her business and to make more income to provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tomatoes to sell, and she hopes this will enable her to make more income to support her family.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco es un caficultor de 42 años, el lleva 25 años en el cultivo de café y cada día pone en práctica nuevas técnica para mejorar la producción, Marco está casado con Zoila con quien tiene 4 hijos, como familia su mayor sueño es poder darles a sus hijos una buena educación y una vida de calidad.
Marco quiere producir café orgánico lo que es una novedad en la región que permite tener mejores precios por el café, la certificación de las fincas aparte de dar mejores ganancias en precio ayuda a tener producciones más abundantes y a proteger el medioambiente por medio de buenas prácticas agrícolas. Aprovechando que las plagas tienen casi acabadas sus fincas Marco aprovechara para replantarlas e iniciar la certificación con la plantación desde el inicio.
Marco solicita un crédito para convertir sus fincas a producción orgánica lo que le permitirá tener mejores ganancias por el café y darle mejores oportunidades a su familia.
Un crédito ayudara a Marco certificar su cafetal lo que le permitirá tener mejores cosechas, mejores precios por el café y por ende una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Marco is 42 years old and a coffee grower. He has been doing this work for 25 years and every day he puts new techniques into practice in order to improve production. Marco is married to Zoila, with whom he has four children. Within the family, Marco's dream is to give his children a good education and good quality of life.

Marco wants to produce organic coffee, a novelty in the region that commands higher prices. Besides higher profits, organic certification helps to produce higher yields and to protect the environment by employing good farming practices.

Taking advantage of the fact that disease has wiped out almost all of his plantation, Marco will re-plant the crops and begin to grow an organic plantation from the start.

Marco is applying for a loan in order to make his coffee plantation organic, allowing him to earn a higher profit for the coffee and to give his family better opportunities.

A loan will help Marco to have his coffee plantation certified, allowing him better harvests and better coffee prices. This will give his family better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy organic supplies such as manure, anti-disease treatments, and other necessary items for making his coffee plantation organic.

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика целенаправленная и общительная женщина из города Канидабам. Ей 34 года она замужем и замечательная мать троих детей. Малика занимается предпринимательством. У нее есть свой магазин. В этом деле ей помогает ее муж. Он привозит ей разнообразные товары для продажи. Однако потратив все сбережения на товары, она не смогла вовремя их продать. Она хотела полученной прибыли купить своим детям школьную форму и канцелярские принадлежности.  Она с надеждой обратилась за кредитом, чтобы успеть купить необходимые вещи своим троим детям на этот учебный год.
texts.en: Malika is a determined and sociable woman from the town of Konibodom. She is 34 years old, married, and the wonderful mother of three children. Malika is an entrepreneur. She has her own store. Her husband helps her with the business. He brings her various goods for sale. However, having spent all their savings on goods, she has not been able to sell them on time. She wanted to use the profit to buy her children school uniforms and stationery supplies. She has applied for a loan with high hopes in order to buy these essentials for her three children on time for this academic year.

loans.use: to buy school uniforms and stationery supplies for her children.

loans.name: Mijgona

texts.ru: Мижгона юная и энергичная девушка из Канибадама. Она замужем и ей 24 года. Муж Мижгоны находится в России на заработках. С раннего детства Мижгоне нравилось наблюдать за дикторами и ведущими различных программ на телевиденье. Со временем ее мечта только возрастала и Мижгона смогла воплотить ее в реальность. Сейчас она работает на местном телевизионном канале ТВ5 в качестве редактора.  Параллельно с этим у нее есть свое хобби, она увлекается шитьем. Мижгона очень хочет обустроить свой дом и сделать в нем ремонт. Именно с этой целью она обратилась за кредитом и надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Mijgona is a young and energetic lady from Konibodom. She is married and she is 24 years old. Mijgona's husband is away earning money in Russia. Since her young childhood Mijgona has liked watching announcers and presenters of various television programs. In time, her dream only grew, and Mijgona has been able to turn it into reality. Now she works for the local TV5 television station as an editor. In parallel with this she has a hobby. She enjoys sewing. Mijgona really wants to complete construction of her house and to carry out renovations in it. She has applied for a loan with this goal, and hopes for your support.

loans.use: to renovate her home.

loans.name: Jose Eldys

texts.es:
Jose tiene 23 años de edad, vive junto a su familia, en el Caserío de Patacon, una zona rural del distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Jose se dedica a la venta y mantenimiento de repuestos de mototaxis, y además a la crianza y venta de animales desde hace 5 años,con muy buenas referenciuas personales, laborales y crediticias, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, son una familia unida, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de mayor cantidad de respuestos para aumentar el stock de su negocio, de esta manera mejorar su volumen de ventas, niveles de ingresos y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose is 23 years old, he lives with his family in Caserío de Patacon, a rural area in the district of Pomahuaca, in the province of Jaén in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

Jose earns a living selling and maintaining spare parts for mototaxis and also by breeding and selling animals. He has done this for five years. He has very good personal, work and credit references. His wife supports him in this work, they are a united family, He has asked for a loan to buy more spare parts in order to increase the stock of his business and in this way, improve his sales, his level of income and his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts to increase the stock of his business.

loans.name: Murodgul

texts.ru: Девушку на фотографии зовут Муродгул. Она добрая и гостеприимная девушка. Ей 28 лет. Муродгул  не замужем и не имеет детей. Она вместе с мамой, братом и невесткой проживает на районе Рудаки. Муродгул большую часть своей жизни проводит дома.  Она принимается заказы на шитье женской одежды более 7 лет. Сейчас чтобы продолжить швейную деятельность Муродгулу необходимо купить другую швейную машинку. Она хочет купить профессиональную машинку. Новая машинка ускорит процесс работы и повлияет на качество шитья. Муродгул надеется на кредит и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: The lady in the photograph is called Murodgul. She is a kind and hospitable lady. She is 28 years old. Murodgul is not married and does not have any children. She and her mother, brother and sister-in-law live in the Rudaki region. Murodgul spends most of her life at home. She has been taking orders to sew women's clothing for over seven years. Now Murodgul needs to buy another sewing machine in order to continue her sewing activity. She wants to buy a professional sewing machine. A new sewing machine will speed up her work and will influence the quality of her sewing. Murodgul hopes for a loan and your support.

loans.use: to buy a professional sewing machine.

loans.name: Shohidakhon

texts.ru: Шохидахон молодая женщина из городка Исфара. Ей 35 лет. У нее пять дочерей. Шохидахон два раза родила двойняшек. Ее старшая дочь уже ходит в школу и в этом году старшие двойняшки-дочки, которым по 7 лет пойдут первый класс. Шохидахон очень рада, этим событием. Теперь она должна купить учебники и нужные для учебы вещи. Шохидахон работает швеей и для нее купить все необходимые школьные принадлежности стоят дорого, но она должна их купить, чтобы ее дети полноценно получили образование. Шохидахон надеется, что благодаря кредиту, она соберет детей в школу и желает, чтобы они учились на отлично.
texts.en: Shohidakhon is a young woman from the town of Isfara. She is 35 years old. She has five daughters. Shohidakhon gave birth to twins twice. Her eldest daughter already goes to school, and this year her eldest twin daughters, who are seven years old, will start first form. Shohidakhon is very happy about this event. Now she must buy textbooks and other things necessary for study. Shohidakhon works as a seamstress and buying all the necessary school supplies is expensive for her, but she must buy them so that her children can get a proper education. Shohidakhon hopes that, thanks to a loan, she will prepare her children for school, and she hopes that they will study very well.

loans.use: to buy textbooks and school supplies.

loans.name: Soro

texts.ru: Соро  21 летняя молодая девушка города Душанбе. Соро в городе живет вместе мамой, отцом и сестрой. Она серьезная девушка, ее сестра научила Соро кроить и шить. Соро дома предоставляет услуги портнихи на заказ. Она 2 года занимается этой деятельности. Соро выбрала эту деятельностью, потому что ее сестра занимается этой сфере деятельностью. Соро очень благодарно сестре, потому что сейчас  она имеет бизнес, и ежедневный доход.  В швейном деле ей нравиться ежедневный доход и общаться с новыми клиентами. Соро решила расширить деятельность и привлечь больше клиентов. За счет кредита она хочет купить швейную машинку и другие швейные принадлежности. С такими планами она обратилась к Вам за кредитом. Ее мечта в будущем открыть свое ателье по шитью национальной женской одежды.
texts.en: Soro is a 21-year-old young lady from the city of Dushanbe. Soro lives in the city with her mother, father and sister. She is a serious woman. Her sister taught Soro to cut and sew. Soro provides a dressmaking service to order from home. She has been engaged in this activity for two years. Soro chose this activity because her sister also works in this sphere. Soro is very grateful to her sister because now she has a business and a daily income. What she likes about sewing is the daily income and communicating with new clients. Soro has decided to expand her business and attract more clients. She wants to buy a sewing machine and other sewing supplies with a loan. With these plans she has turned to you for a loan. Her dream is to open her own workshop in the future to sew women's national clothing.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en:
Shehnaz is 36 years old. She is a widow and has one child. She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She has been doing this for many years. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life.

To help her continue operation of her business, she requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to buy sewing materials, such as spools of threads in different colors, packs of zippers, and buttons to sew more dresses on time. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials, such as spools of threads in different colors, packs of zippers, and buttons to sew more dresses on time.

loans.name: Mutriba

texts.ru: Мутриба умная и активная женщина. Она уроженка города Исфары. Мутриба замужем и у неё одна 4-летная дочка и 8-летный сын. Мутриба работает учительницей в одной из средних школ своего города. Она хороший преподаватель, однако, её зарплата в школе очень мала. Её муж мастер по ремонту домов. Так как сейчас летные каникулы, она в отпуске и не получает доход. Мутриба посоветовавшись с мужем, решила открыть магазин и продавать там продукты питания. Её муж уже достроил ей магазин, но, к сожалению, средств на закупку продуктов им не хватило. Мутриба с большой надеждой обратилось за кредитом. Она верит, что с вашей поддержкой она сможет начать свой новый бизнес.
texts.en: Mutriba is a clever and active woman. She is a native of the town of Isfara. Mutriba is married and she has a four-year-old daughter and an eight-year-old son. Mutriba works as a teacher in one of her town's secondary schools. She is a good teacher, however her school salary is very small. Her husband renovates houses. Since it is now the summer break, she is on vacation and does not receive an income. Mutriba has talked with her husband and decided to open a store and sell groceries there. Her husband has already build her a store, but unfortunately they did not have enough funds to buy groceries. Mutriba has applied for a loan with high hopes. She believes that, with your support, she will be able to start her new business.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.ru: Шоира 23 летняя молодая и красивая девушка жительница города Душанбе. Она еще не замужем и не имеет детей. Шоира живет вместе мамой. Мама домохозяйка она помогает Шоире в работе. Шоира 3 года занята швейной деле. Она занимается шитьем женской одежды. Шоира самостоятельная девушка, она зарабатывает и помогает маме. В швейном деле ей нравится сшить национальную женскую одежду. Шоира решила купить новую многофункциональную швейную машинку, чтобы расширить деятельность и улучшить свою деятельность. Но так как на эту цель у нее нет достаточных финансовых средств, она решилась обратиться за кредитом. Поддержите ее достичь своих целей.
texts.en: Shoira is a young and beautiful 23-year-old resident of the city of Dushanbe. She is not yet married and does not have any children. Shoira lives with her mother. Her mother is a homemaker and helps Shoira to work. Shoira has been occupied with a sewing business for three years. She sews womens' clothing. Shoira is an independent woman. She earns and helps her mother. What she likes about sewing is sewing national women's clothing. Shoira has decided to buy a new multi-functional sewing machine in order to expand her business and improve her work. But since she does not have enough financial resources for this goal, she has decided to apply for a loan. Please support her in achieving her goals.

loans.use: to buy a multi-functional sewing machine.

loans.name: Nargiz

texts.ru: Наргиз благодарить Вас на Вашу поддержку. Она успешно погасила предыдущий кредит. Наргиз  добрая, общительная и гостеприимная женщина. Народ Душанбе славится своим не сравнительным стилем гостеприимства и чувство юмора. Шить и кроить ее любимое дело. Она старается помочь мужу обеспечить семью. Наргиз хочет создать хорошие условия жизни семьи. Она просит кредит для мероприятия обрезания младшего сына. У нее не хватает денег, и она обратилась за кредитом. Наргиз верит, что ей не откажут в кредите и заранее выражает благодарность.
texts.en: Nargiz thanks you for your support. She repaid her previous loan successfully. Nargiz is a kind, sociable and hospitable woman. The people of Dushanbe are known for their incomparable hospitality and sense of humor. Her favorite activity is cutting and sewing. She tries to help her husband to provide for the family. Nargiz wants to create good living conditions for her family. She is asking for a loan for her youngest son's circumcision ceremony. She does not have enough money, and she has applied for a loan. Nargiz believes that she will not be refused a loan, and expresses her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to pay for her youngest son's circumcision ceremony.

loans.name: Nisso

texts.ru: Эту скромную и ответственную женщину зовут Ниссо. Ниссо 56 летняя женщина. Она замужем и мать одного сына, и у нее есть невестка. Ниссо занимается портнихой у себя дома. Она опытная и талантливая швея. Ниссо берет заказы на шитье национальной женской одежды. Такой деятельностью она занимается более 2,5 года. Она очень любить свою работу и хочет заняться еще много лет. Ей в работе нравится результаты, которых, она в процессе добивается. Ниссо нравится смотреть на восторженные лица своих клиентов, после того как они надевают заказанные платья. На сегодняшний день швейная машинка Ниссо не пригодна для использования. И она хочет на деньги от кредита купить новую машинку и больше ткани, чтобы поскорее приступить к работе и расширить деятельность.
texts.en: This modest and responsible woman is called Nisso. Nisso is a 56-year-old woman. She is married and the mother of one son, and she has a daughter-in-law. Nisso works as a dressmaker from home. She is an experienced and talented seamstress. Nisso takes orders to sew national women's clothing. She has been doing this work for over two and a half years. She really loves her work and wants to do it for many years more. What she likes about the work is seeing the results that she achieves through it. Nisso likes to see the delighted faces of her customers when they put on the dresses they have ordered. At the present time Nisso's sewing machine is not suitable for use, and she wants to use the money from a loan to buy a new sewing machine and more fabric in order to start work quickly and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Wilfredo Jesús

texts.es:
Wilfredo es un joven estudiante que vive junto a su familia en el Distrito de Chorrillos. Su madre tiene una pequeña juguería para sacar adelante a su familia. Él durante sus vacaciones también apoya a su madre, preparando jugos y atendiendo al público.

Wilfredo decidió estudiar la carrera de Química Textil porque le gusta mucho la química y los colores, también es una de las carreras con mucha demanda laboral en nuestro país. Actualmente está cursando el III Semestre, aún le falta año y medio para poder culminar su carrera. Le va muy bien con sus cursos, se siente muy contento, por eso no quiere dejar de estudiar y busca el apoyo de KIVA para poder terminar su carrera en el tiempo estimado que le falta.

Cuando termine de estudiar, le agradaría mucho trabajar en una empresa llamada Sudamericana de Fibras, quiere explotar al máximo sus conocimientos, adquirir más experiencia, luego quiere independizarse para formar un negocio propio, y así compartir lo aprendido, en beneficio de la sociedad. Logrará sacar adelante a su familia que tanto sacrificio hacen para que él no deje de estudiar.

El motivo por el cual Wilfredo recurre a KIVA, es porque su madre ya no puede pagar las mensualidades de su carrera y este préstamo le ayudaría mucho económicamente para seguir avanzando en sus estudios, logrando cambios muy importantes en él, porque tendrá la confianza que necesita para poder luchar por alcanzar sus sueños.

Al haber logrado este crédito, Wilfredo se siente muy feliz porque podrá lograr la excelencia en su carrera y ser una buena persona para orgullo de su familia y ejemplo de sus hermanos menores, lo cual es el mayor sueño que tiene en la vida.

Wilfredo les expresa lo siguiente: "Me siento muy feliz al saber que hay instituciones como KIVA que apuestan por el desarrollo profesional de los estudiantes. Muchas gracias por todo y nunca los decepcionaremos, para que no pierdan la fe en las personas que necesitamos de su ayuda".
texts.en:
Wilfredo is a young student who lives with his family in the Chorrillos District. His mother has a small juice shop that helps her family get ahead. During vacation time Wilfredo helps his mother, preparing juices and waiting on the customers.

Wilfredo chose to study Textile Chemistry because he likes chemistry and colors a lot. It is also one of the fields with high labor demand in his country. He is currently in his third semester, which means he has a year and a half to go before he finishes his studies. He is doing well in his classes and is very happy, which is why he doesn't want to stop studying, and therefore asks the Kiva community's help so that he can finish his studies in the aforementioned time period.

When he finishes with his education he would like to work in a company call Sudamericana de Fibras [South American Fibers]. He wants to make the most out of his knowledge, acquire more experience, then go independent and start his own business, and by doing so, be able to share what he has learned for society's benefit. In doing this, he will get his family ahead, as they have sacrificed so much so that he can continue with his studies.

The reason why Wilfredo is turning to Kiva is because his mother can no longer pay the monthly tuition fees. A loan would help him economically a great deal, and ensure that he continues studying, which would mean so much for him as he would have the confidence he needs to continue fighting for his dreams.

Being qualified for this loan, Wilfred is very happy because he will be able to excel in his studies, be a successful person, make his family proud, and be a great example for his younger brothers, which is his biggest dream in life.

Wilfred would like to say the following: "I feel very happy knowing that there are institutions such as Kiva that bet on the professional development of students. Thank you so much for everything, and we will never let you down, so that you never lose faith in the people who need your help".

loans.use: to pay his monthly tuition fees for his Textile Chemistry studies, so that he can become a great entrepreneur.

loans.name: Angelica Teresa

texts.es:
Angelica Teresa tiene 45 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú.La población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

Angelica se dedica a la elaboración de comida, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Aicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, con buenas referencias laborales y personales. El presente crédito será para la compra de materiales como ollas, platos, mesas y sillas para implementar su negocio, con esto Angelica Teresa espera poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que tendrá gran influencia en el negocio y le generará mayores niveles de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Angelica Teresa is 45 years old, a single mother, who lives with her son in the district of Oyotún, located in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The population's principal economic activities are agriculture, the commercial sector, and cattle raising. 

Angelica works in food preparation. Her business is located in her own home. Additionally, she raises and sells guinea pigs. She has more than 10 years of experience in the business, with good professional and personal references. The current loan will be for the purchase of materials like pots, plates, tables and chairs to use in her business. With this, Angelica Teresa hopes to offer better service to her customers, which will have a great influence on her business and will generate greater levels of income, thereby improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials like pots, plates, tables and chairs to use in her business.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a 37-year-old woman from the community of San Miguel, Bohol. She is married with three children aged two, five and twelve.

Elena needs help because she does not have funds for her farm. She is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy fertilizer to keep her crops growing abundantly.

Elena hopes that she can continue sending her children to school, give them healthy meals, and make a success out of her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Ma. Lulu

texts.en:
Ma. Lulu, 39, from Tigbauan, Iloilo, owns a tricycle for income. Her husband, Rene, drives it while she retails cellphone loading for extra income. Basically they earn enough to support their family’s basic needs such as food and meagre school allowances for their three children. One of them is studying in college and the other two are in high school. When it comes to their tuition fees, Ma. Lulu worries about where to get it, especially these days that her tricycle is damaged.

Ma. Lulu wants to buy spare parts of such as tires, a chain, a brake cable and oil. She seeks your generosity to lend her PHP 17,000 for this purpose. Part of it will be used to buy a load wallet for her cellphone e-loading business.

Ma. Lulu is contemplating how to expand her livelihood. She aims to buy another unit that she can rent out to her neighbour in the near future. This will somehow ensure the future education of her children.

She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God. * All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy tires, a chain, a brake cable and oil for her motorcycle.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en: Nazia is a 26-year-old, married woman.  She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband (who is also shown in the photo) at the corner of her house.  Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts over the years.  She is motivated to provide good quality food, clothing, and health for her family.  She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 60,000 PKR to buy packs of salt, biscuits, rice, spices, and juices to handle her customers' increasing demands efficiently and to boost her earnings so that she can expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits, rice, spices, and juices to handle her customers' increasing demands efficiently.

loans.name: Hingminashi Nupi Lup Group

texts.en:
Gangarani, the group leader, is a mother of 2 children.  She started her own business, running a small shop to support her family, because her husband's income was not enough to cover the family's expenses.  She wishes to expand her store, but she cannot due to a lack of capital.  She cannot take a loan from local lenders due to high interest rates. 

Gangarani met five other women who were in similar situations and were looking to expand their businesses.  They decided to form a group, consisting of 6 members from the same locality who have the same incomes.  The group decided to take a loan from YVU, a partner of Milaap.  They agreed to comply with the rules / regulations and to repay the loan in regular installments.  They have requested 10,000 INR per member (or a total of 60,000 INR for the group).  Each member will be able to earn a profit of 250 to 300 INR per day, and it will become easier for each member to cover family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase chips, biscuits, grocery items, detergent powder, and edible oil to stock her shop.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Manuel de Jesús es un caficultor de 55 años casado con Ada, Él se dedica a la producción de café bajo distintos sellos de certificación como ser: Comercio Justo y Rainforest que comercializa por medio de COCAFCAL, el lleva 35 años en la producción de café y 8 años trabajando con sellos de certificación.
Manuel de Jesús tiene 3 hijos bajo su cargo y son lo más importante que él y Ada tienen como matrimonio la educación de los niños es la prioridad, El sueño de la pareja es que sus hijos puedan aprovechar su juventud para formarse y que cuando llegue su momento sean personas de bien.  
Actualmente en la región se ha vuelto muy popular producir café bajo prácticas de producción orgánica, estas prácticas mejoran la calidad del café lo que hace posible obtener mejores precios por el producto cosechado, además hace las fincas más sostenibles y amigables con el ambiente, es por eso que Manuel de Jesús quiere convertir sus fincas a producción orgánica y aprovechando que las plagas han deteriorado la plantación el decidió replantar el cafetal y llevar a cabo el proceso de certificación con las plantaciones totalmente nuevas. 
Manuel de Jesús Solicita un crédito para llevar a cabo las labores de certificación y replantación de su cafetal, con las ganancias obtenidas por su café el espera obtener ingresos suficientes para darles a sus hijos una calidad de vida digna, darles una buena educación e iniciar la creación de un pequeño patrimonio familiar.
Un crédito ayudara Manuel de Jesús a iniciar a cultivar y a producir café sin producir un impacto negativo en el medio y además le proporcionara ingresos extras para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús is a 55-year-old coffee grower married to Ada. He makes his living in coffee production under different certifications such as Fairtrade and Rainforest marketed through COCAFCAL. He has been producing coffee for 35 years and has been working with certifications for 8 years.

Manuel de Jesús has 3 children under his charge, and they are the most important thing that he and Ada have in their marriage. The education of the children is the priority. The couple’s dream is for their children to take advantage of their youth to educate themselves and become good people.

Currently it has become very popular in the region to produce coffee under organic production practices. These practices improve the quality of the coffee, which makes it possible to obtain better prices for the harvested product. They also make the plantations more sustainable and environmentally friendly. For this reason, Manuel de Jesús wants to convert his plantation to organic production and, taking advantage of the fact that pests have damaged the plantation, he has decided to replant the coffee trees and go through the certification process with the completely new plants.

Manuel de Jesús is requesting a loan to carry out the tasks of certification and replanting his coffee. With the profits from his coffee he hopes to obtain enough income to give his children a decent quality of life, give them a good education, and start creating a small family estate.

A loan will help Manuel de Jesús start to grow and produce coffee without causing a negative impact on the environment and will also provide extra income to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy organic supplies such as organic fertilizer and insecticide, and other materials necessary to make his coffee plantation organic.

loans.name: Ima Emoinu Group

texts.en:
Memee is married and is a mother of 2 children.  She runs a mat-making business of her own in the Thoubal district in Manipur.  She makes 6,000 INR from this business.  Combined with the income her husband earns, her household's monthly income is 10,000 INR.  She wants her children to have access to good education.  To fund their education, she needs more money than she is able to save currently.  She believes that the increased income from expanding her mat-making business will bridge the gap.  Thus, Memee seeks a loan to invest in her business.  She is confident that she will double her income by expanding her business.  She will use the loan to sell phak, phakchumsa, phakaronbi, etc.

Memee is joined by Shyama, Thaba, Borni, Manitombi, and Sana in applying for a loan.  Together, they need a loan of 90,000 INR to expand their respective businesses.  With the loan, they will be able to purchase adequate raw materials for mat-making, such as kouna, small rope, etc.  They are thankful for the financial assistance.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for her mat-making business.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Arlene works hard to support her family.  She has a tricycle passenger business in the Philippines, and she also earns income from a general store.  Arlene is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy wheels and other spare parts for her tricycle to transport passengers.

Arlene has sustained her business activities through 3 previous loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and being able to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy wheels and other spare parts for her tricycle to transport passengers.

loans.name: Maksym

texts.en:
Maksym grows vegetables in a greenhouses. Due to the previous loan on KIVA he got additional profit and built a new greenhouse.

This year the prices for tomatoes were very low. Maksym got less money than he expected from selling vegetables. At the same time he wants to develop his business further.

Maksym is asking for a loan of 25 000 UAH to purchase coal for heating greenhouses. He wants to start growing vegetables in early Spring and get bigger income.

loans.use: buy coal to heat his greenhouses.

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en: Amelita is 42 years old and comes from Bien Unido, Bohol. She learned fishing through her husband who is a fisherman. She is asking a loan to buy tools and materials for her boat such as engine, plywood, nails and paint. This is her way to ensure her husband can fish daily. This will help her husband to catch more and they will earn better. This will also mean that with a better income, she can continue sending her children to school. The children are ages 8, 12 and 18.  Amelita will use their income for tuition fees and reinvestment in their business.

loans.use: maintain her fishing boat

loans.name: Alaa'

texts.en:
Alaa' is a 30-year-old single man from Nablus City, an old and beautiful place in the West Bank, where unemployment is very high. 

Alaa'  has a small business buying eggs wholesale and reselling them for a small profit margin.  As part of this business, he must buy items in bulk (large quantities) and deliver them to his customers using his personal vehicle.  

Alaa'  has taken out a loan from FATEN, which will help him to buy more eggs in bulk to resell. Alaa' ’s loan will enable him to increase the size of his business and his income.

loans.use: buy wholesale eggs

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes wishes that her variety store will progress, thus she exerts her best effort to make it stable. She lives in Bacolod City, Negros Occidental together with her husband Danilo and their children. They are living in a community where people are quite familiar with each other. Therefore Lourdes finds it difficult to refuse her neighbors who pay late for the goods they get from her store. This practice shakes the stability of her business. To continue with her business, she requests additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy more items for her inventory. It will improve her profit and will help sustain their everyday needs. It will also contribute some steps towards her dream of enjoying a little comfort in the near future. She is praying that you will be one of God’s instruments to help her. She will really appreciate your kind support. 
	
Lourdes is committed to CCT Credit Cooperative’s vision to alleviate poverty and she regularly meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God. *All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia is a hardworking woman at 61 years old. She lives in San Miguel, Bohol. She runs a rice farming business and also sells home-cooked dishes and grocery items. This has been her business for nine years now. Virginia is asking for a loan to buy salt, vegetables, soy sauce, cooking oil, soft drinks, liquor, toiletries and canned food. With this, she will be able to improve the diversity of her stock and continue supporting her children and family. Virginia is optimistic that through this loan, she will be able to improve her livelihood and live an abundant life with her family.

loans.use: to  buy salt, vegetables, soy sauce, cooking oil, soft drinks, liquor, toiletries and canned food.

loans.name: Clarisse

texts.en:
Clarisse is 27 years old and has two children. She is married and her two children are in school.

Clarisse is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Clarisse would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: buy medicine & vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.  She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.  She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures as well, like a food vending business.

Editha dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Roselyn is 34 years old and her three children are in school.

Roselyn has a general store business in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Roselyn has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen  is 56 years old.  She is a married woman.  Parveen deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

Parveen needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 60000  to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: buy cattle & livestock

loans.name: Ramzana

texts.en: Ramzana  is a 30-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 2 children.  Some years ago she started her business selling animals in her community.  Her husband fully supports and assists her with her work. Now, she has requested for a loan of 40000 PKR.  She wants to use this loan amount  to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. She aspires to save money to provide a prosperous future for her family.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Abigael

texts.en:
Abigael works hard to support herself. Abigael is single and has a clothing retail business in the Philippines.

Abigael requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more clothing to sell.  She has been in this business for three years.

In the future, Abigael would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Shanazia

texts.en:
Shanazia is a 25 year old, married lady. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. Some years ago she started her tailoring business for running her household activities.

At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses. She has now requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors for stitching more dresses on time to get a boost in her earnings. She wishes to spend it on providing a quality life to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors

loans.name: Mziuri

texts.en:
Mziuri is a 34-year-old, married woman. She lives in Kobuleti district with her husband, 2 school-aged children, and parents-in-law. In the region, there is a high unemployment rate, but self-employment helps inhabitants to make a living. Her family is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, they have a cow and a plot of agricultural land where they grow mandarin trees and nut trees. Mziuri sells the harvested products locally at a good price.

This start-up program from LLC Micro Finance Organization Credo gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. With the loan of GEL 2300, Mziuri will purchase a car and her husband will serve local people as a taxi driver. They will generate more income and they will be able to cover everyday costs and also improve their living conditions in the future. With support of the start-up program, the family will tackle their financial difficulties.

loans.use: buy a taxi car

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia tiene 34 años, es casada y tiene un hijo pequeño. Claudia vive en la ciudad de México y estudió administración de empresas. Desde hace 10 años ella se dedica a la venta de joyería de chapa de oro, plata y rodio, ella inició su negocio porque quería tener algo propio y aumentar sus ingresos, tener disposición de sus tiempo y estar con su hijo.  Ella con su negocio quiere solventar sus gastos, tener ingresos mayores y poder expandir su negocio a modo de franquicias, además de tener estabilidad y libertad económica. Su principal dificultad en este negoció son las temporadas, porque algunas veces vende muy bien y otras le va muy mal, ella debe estar a la vanguardia y renovar constantemente su mercancía. Con un préstamo de MXN 10,000 ella podrá renovar su mercancía completamente y abrirá nuevos puntos de venta. Claudia es una mujer emprendedora porque tiene visión y expectativas muy altas, luchas por sus objetivos y sueños, siempre está analizando la posibilidad de negocios redituables, además de ser una mujer muy perseverante. Ella agradece mucho a las personas que le otorgan la ayuda para poder seguir creciendo en su negocio y solventar sus gastos, así como aumenta sus posibilidades de ingresos y de mercado.
texts.en:
Claudia is 34 years old, is married, and has a small son. She lives in Mexico City and studied business administration. 

For the last ten years she has sold gold plate, silver and rhodium jewelry.
